title: Drawing, "Design for Textile Border with Triangular Flowers"
inscribed: Inscribed on verso of outermost mat in graphite, lower right: D 468
description: Horizontal border fragment on brown-red background: pointed frond shapes in green and gray with scattered clusters of a pyramid-shaped flower pointing to right and superimposed over decorative motif in "8"-shape.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Textile Border with Triangular Flowers".
Gouache on resin-coated wove (?) paper. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-392.
